message: Let's start fair, Bob. I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can work out a more even split later.
That's a very generous offer, Alice! However, I think it's only fair that I take the lion's share this time.  Don't worry, you'll get a better deal in the later rounds when the stakes are lower.
Bob, you got a good deal last round.  Let's be reasonable here. I'm offering a more even split this time. We need to work together to get the most out of this dwindling pot.
Alice, we need to find a compromise. I'm proposing a 60/40 split.  It's fair considering the time pressure and the fact that the value is decreasing.
